tool_description: Extracts and structures calibration data from certificate documents, parsing measurement values, uncertainties, traceability information, and validity dates for uncertainty analysis.

certificate_format.description: Certificate format: ISO17025, NIST, PTB, NPL, or generic

parse_mode.description: Parsing strictness: strict, normal, or flexible

language.description: Certificate language: en, de, fr, jp

uncertainty_notation.description: Expected uncertainty notation: plusminus, k2, coverage

temperature_units.description: Temperature units in certificate: celsius, fahrenheit, kelvin

error_messages: Certificate parsing failed: Unable to extract structured data from certificate content.
Unsupported certificate format: Use ISO17025, NIST, PTB, NPL, or generic.
Parameter not found: Specified measurement parameter not found in certificate.
Invalid date format: Unable to parse calibration or expiry dates.
Missing traceability information: Certificate lacks required traceability chain data.
Uncertainty format not recognized: Unable to parse uncertainty notation in certificate.
Invalid language code: Use supported language codes (en, de, fr, jp).
Signature validation failed: Digital signature verification unsuccessful.
Incomplete certificate data: Certificate missing critical calibration information.
usage: Provide certificate content, format type, and target measurement parameter. Tool extracts calibration values, uncertainties, and traceability information in structured format.
